search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Drip (drip.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Drip can be found at: [https://www.drip.com/pricing](https://www.drip.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

citations.title: Drip Ecommerce Marketing Software Pricing | Get Started with Drip

extracted_content.content:
Drip Ecommerce Marketing Software Pricing | Get Started with Drip
===============

We, and our third-party partners, use cookies, pixels, and other technologies ("cookies") to collect, record, and share information you provide, as well as information about your interactions with our site for ad targeting, analytics, personalization, and site functionality purposes.

  
By continuing to use this site or by clicking "Accept," you agree to our [Terms of Service](https://www.drip.com/terms "Terms of Service") (which includes important waivers) and acknowledge our privacy practices as described in our [Privacy Policy](https://www.drip.com/privacy "Privacy Policy").

We won't track your information when you visit our site. But in order to comply with your preferences, we'll have to use just one tiny cookie so that you're not asked to make this choice again.

AcceptDecline

Get closer to your customers with Drip.
---------------------------------------

[Try Drip free](https://www.drip.com/signup) [Demo Drip](https://www.drip.com/book-a-demo) [Sign in](https://www.getdrip.com/dashboard)

[Start of main content](https://www.drip.com/pricing#content)

Uplevel your marketing with simple, flexible pricing that grows with your business.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

No hidden fees or charges - pricing is based on your list size and send volume.

How many people are on your email list?

 people

#### Price per month:

$39
---

[Start for free](https://www.drip.com/signup) [Book a demo](https://www.drip.com/book-a-demo)

14-day free trial. No credit card required.

#### Included in price:

*   1-2,500 people
*   Unlimited email sends
*   Email support
*   Chat and email support
*   Dynamic segments
*   Onsite campaigns
*   Up to 50 workflows
*   Unlimited sub-accounts
*   Open API access
*   Free migration
*   Personalized onboarding

Get access to powerful features  
to grow your business:
--------------------------------------------------------

![Image 19: icon__email-marketing](https://www.drip.com/hubfs/Drip%20Website/Icons/Blob%20Icons/icon__email-marketing.svg)

Market across multiple channels - email, social, and onsite pop ups

![Image 20: icon__segmentation](https://www.drip.com/hubfs/Drip%20Website/Icons/Blob%20Icons/icon__segmentation.svg)

Deep behavior based customer segmentation and personalization

![Image 21: icon__integrations](https://www.drip.com/hubfs/Drip%20Website/Icons/Blob%20Icons/icon__integrations.svg)

In-app insights and guidance - to get you started and keep you growing

![Image 22: icon__prebuilt-workflows](https://www.drip.com/hubfs/Drip%20Website/Icons/Blob%20Icons/icon__prebuilt-workflows.svg)

Pre-built playbooks - like welcome series and abandoned cart

![Image 23: icon__reporting](https://www.drip.com/hubfs/Drip%20Website/Icons/Blob%20Icons/icon__reporting.svg)

One click integrations - with your store and other marketing tools

![Image 24: icon__support](https://www.drip.com/hubfs/Drip%20Website/Icons/Blob%20Icons/icon__support.svg)

Smart A/B testing

Trusted by 6,000+ brands
------------------------

Join our growing community of brands that have used Drip to generate more than $1.5 billion in attributed revenue.

![Image 25](https://www.drip.com/hubfs/raw_assets/public/drip/images/modules/content/reviews-with-cta/review__shopify.png)

#### "This is the most impressive email marketing tool I have used. "

“And I have used them all. The segmentation powers are wonderful, the email builder is elegant and easy and most importantly, it is powerful.”

Imperial Blades

Shopify Review

![Image 26](https://www.drip.com/hubfs/raw_assets/public/drip/images/modules/content/reviews-with-cta/review__g2-crowd.png)

#### "I love how simple and easy it is to integrate with ecommerce platforms."

“The integrations make it really easy to see how each email performed from a financial perspective, so I can replicate the types of emails that generate the most revenue.”

Michael C.

G2 Crowd Review

![Image 27](https://www.drip.com/hubfs/raw_assets/public/drip/images/modules/content/reviews-with-cta/review__shopify.png)

#### "Drip is both easy to use and really powerful. There's nothing that you can't do with it!"

“You can connect multiple services just like Shopify and set up pretty much anything you want to retarget your customers and send them emails. Greatest service ever! ”

LNOC Store

Shopify Review

Frequently Asked Questions
--------------------------

[Is the trial really free?](javascript:void(0))

Yes. Drip doesn’t require your credit card info in order to start a trial. You won’t be charged until you upgrade by providing your payment information.

[Do you restrict features while on the free trial?](javascript:void(0))

Unlimited emails are not available during your free trial. Other than that, you have free rein to use all of Drip’s features. Here are a few we think you’ll like:

*   Automated workflows based on customer activity
*   90+ integrations (including to Shopify, BigCommerce, and WooCommerce)
*   Email templates and visual builder

[What happens when my free trial expires?](javascript:void(0))

After 14 days you will be prompted to upgrade to a paid plan and enter your credit card information.

[Do I need to have an ecommerce store to use Drip?](javascript:void(0))

No. It’s not a requirement to have an ecommerce store to use Drip, however, we are built specifically for ecommerce and you will get the most out of our platform and features if you’re an online store.

[How does pricing work?](javascript:void(0))

Your cost is based on the number of active people in your account and the volume of emails you send during the month.

[Can I cancel anytime?](javascript:void(0))

Yes. Cancel your subscription anytime in your Billing Settings.

[Can I upgrade before my trial is over?](javascript:void(0))

You sure can! Upgrade at any time under **Settings \> Billing**. After you enter your CC info you will have access to unlimited email sends.

[What's the setup process like?](javascript:void(0))

We've made the setup as painless as possible. It's a simple three-step process; connect your ecommerce shop to Drip, import your list, and activate your campaign or workflow. Then it's off to the races.

[Can I integrate with other apps during my free trial?](javascript:void(0))

Of course — in fact, we encourage it! Connect your order management system / ecommerce store to Drip during your free trial period so you can take full advantage of our features: revenue dashboards, ecommerce automations, dynamic content blocks, and more.

[When will I get charged for my trial?](javascript:void(0))

Because we don’t ask for your credit card info in order to take a trial, your card won’t get charged unless you choose to upgrade your account. However, if you don’t upgrade your account and your trial expires, then your account will become inactive and any active forms and campaigns will be paused until you upgrade. You can upgrade by going into the “Billing” section under “Settings” at any time.

[I just want to see how Drip works.](javascript:void(0))

Absolutely. Sign up for a [free trial](https://www.drip.com/signup) to see Drip in action.

[What type of support is offered?](javascript:void(0))

All paying Drip customers have access to email support from 9 am to 5 pm CT, Monday through Friday. Drip customers on the $99/mo + plans have access to live chat support from 9 am to 5 pm CT, Monday through Friday.

Take your marketing strategy to the next level.
-----------------------------------------------
